title: Pinnacles National Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions              Current Conditions          Alerts    Caution        Peligro de Incendios EXTREMO  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Peligro de Incendios EXTREMO  No hay fuegos permitidos bajo ninguna circunstancia, con la excepción de aquellos que utilizan estufas de propano.          Fire Danger EXTREME  Alert 2 , Severity ,caution ,, Fire Danger EXTREME  No fires permitted under any circumstance, with the exception of those utilizing propane stoves. more             Weather Forecast  Check the current weather forecast for Pinnacles National Park from the National Weather Service  Fire Danger  EXTREME Due to extreme fire danger, fire restrictions are in place until further notice. Open fires including charcoal grills are prohibited in all areas of the park. Only gas/propane stoves with on and off control settings are permitted.   Debido a que gran peligro de incendios, restricciones de fuego estan en su lugar hasta nuevo aviso. Los fuegos abiertos, incluyendo las parrillas de carbon estan prohibidos en todas las areas del parque. Solo se permiten las estufas de gas/propano con los ajustes de control.        Talus Cave Closure Status  Both the Bear Gulch and Balconies Caves are subject to closures due to Townsends big eared bat activity or dangerous conditions such as high water during and after storms. Check here for the current Talus Cave Status.
